Sentencas: We use a detailed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) model for micro-grid applications to analyze the effect of failure and degradation on system performance.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: Design and operational constraints on a component and system level are presented.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: A degrees of freedom analysis identifies controlled and manipulated system variables which are important for control.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: Experimental data are included to model complex degradation phenomena of the SOFC unit.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: Rather than using a constant value, a spatially distributed degradation rate as function of temperature and current density is used that allows to study trajectory-based performance deterioration.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: The SOFC unit is assumed to consist of multiple stacks.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: The failure scenario studied is the loss of one individual SOFC stack, e.g. due to breakage of sealing or a series of fuel cells.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: Simulations reveal that degradation leads to significant drifts from the design operating point.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: Moreover, failure of individual stacks may bring the still operating power generation unit into a regime where further failures and accelerated degradation is more likely.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: It is shown that system design, dimensioning, operation and control are strongly linked.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance

Sentencas: Apart from specific quantitative results perhaps the main practical contribution are the collected constraints and the degrees of freedom analysis.
Titulo: Mathematical modeling and simulation of hydrogen-fueled solid oxide fuel cell system for micro-grid applications - Effect of failure and degradation on transient performance
